channel.title: Latest Traffic Information for England - All confirmed events, on the M40
channel.description: The latest traffic information for England's motorway and trunk routes provided by the Highways Agency.

image.title: Latest Traffic Information for England - All confirmed events, on the M40

item.author: ha_info@highways.gsi.gov.uk
item.title: M40 northbound between J6 and J7 | Northbound | Roadworks
item.description: On the M40 northbound between junctions J6 and J8A, there are currently delays of 10 mins due to carriageway resurfacing closing two lanes. Expect disruption until 6:00 am.

item.author: ha_info@highways.gsi.gov.uk
item.title: M40 northbound between J1A and J2 | Northbound | Roadworks
item.description: On the M40 northbound between junctions J1A and J2, there are currently delays of 10 mins due to carriageway resurfacing closing three lanes. Expect disruption until 6:00 am.

item.description: On the M40 northbound between junctions J1A and J2, there are currently delays of 10 mins due to carriageway resurfacing closing three lanes. Expect disruption until 6:00 am.

item.author: ha_info@highways.gsi.gov.uk
item.title: M40 southbound between J14 and J13 | Southbound | Roadworks
item.description: The M40 southbound will be closed between junctions J14 and J13 due to roadworks, between 9:30 pm and 5 am, from 3 October 2011 to 5 October 2011.
